company_description.value: Leading provider of scalable cloud-based ERP and CRM solutions with a focus on data security and user-friendly interfaces. Serves North America and Europe with a subscription-based revenue model.

investment_thesis.value: 1) Robust, customizable ERP/CRM product suite; 2) Recurring subscription revenue; 3) Strong client retention via innovation and service.

recent_events.value: Q1 2024: Onboarded 3 new healthcare clients; expanded services with financial clients. EBITDA margin improved to 39.3% via cloud scaling and cost management.

company_assessment.value: Strong performance with 29.5% 3-yr revenue CAGR and 35.1% EBITDA CAGR. Focus on AI/ML integration and APAC expansion in late 2024.

company_description.value: Innovator in IoT-enabled smart farming systems and organic pest control. Technology optimizes resource usage, reduces waste, and improves crop yields for clients across the Americas.

investment_thesis.value: 1) High-growth sustainable agri-tech sector; 2) Proprietary IoT sensors and bio-pesticides; 3) Alignment with ESG trends.

recent_events.value: Q3 2024: Launched compact smart irrigation system; expanded partnerships with organic farms. YTD revenue +30.6% YoY ($40.5M) and EBITDA +40.0% ($14.0M).

company_assessment.value: Strong 33.3% 3-yr revenue CAGR and 49.3% EBITDA CAGR. Focus on next-gen bio-sensors, AI analytics, and global expansion (Europe/Asia).

extraction_info.text:
═══ PAGE 1 ═══
Horizon Capital
Registered Address
Horizon Capital Partners I Limited
HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL - TRADE SECRET PO Box 123, Ocean House,
Azure Islands
15 April 2024
Correspondence Address

Dear Limited Partners of Horizon Growth Fund I L.P.,
Horizon Growth Fund I L.P. - 1st Quarter 2024 Report
We are pleased to present our 1st Quarter 2024 report ("Q1 2024") for your information.
If you have any questions concerning this report, please do not hesitate to contact either Evelyn
Reed (6543 2123). Thank you again for your support to the Fund.
Sincerely
Evelyn Reed
Horizon Capital Partners I Limited,
the General Partner to Horizon Growth Fund I L.P.

═══ PAGE 2 ═══
Zenith Innovations Ltd.
Deal Team: Evelyn Reed, Marcus Chen, Sophia Lee
Date of Inv: December 2021 Primary Industry: Cloud Software Solutions
Invested Capital: 75 Currency: US$ (in millions)
Capital Returned: 0 Location: New York
Ownership: 65% Latest Audited FY: 31-Dec-2023
Inv Type: Equity-Control Latest Quarter: Q1 2024
Fund: Horizon Growth Fund I L.P. Co Website: http://www.zenith-innovations.com
COMPANY INFORMATION
● Incorporated in 2015, Zenith Innovations is a leading provider of scalable cloud-based software solutions
for enterprise resource planning (ERP) and customer relationship management (CRM).
● Zenith serves a growing client base across North America and Europe, with a strong emphasis on data
security and user-friendly interfaces.
INVESTMENT THESIS
● Robust Product Suite: Zenith’s comprehensive ERP and CRM platforms are highly customizable, offering
competitive advantages in specific vertical markets.
● Recurring Revenue Model: High proportion of subscription-based revenue, ensuring stable and
predictable cash flows.
● Strong Client Retention: Demonstrated ability to retain clients through superior customer service and
continuous product innovation.
HISTORICAL PERFORMANCE
(FYE Dec-31, in US$ million) 2020 2021 2022 2023 3 Yr CAGR
Revenue 28.0 35.5 48.0 62.5 29.5%
EBITDA 9.5 12.0 17.5 24.0 35.1%
EBITDA Margin (%) 33.9% 33.8% 36.5% 38.4%
Capex 1.2 1.8 2.5 3.0
Net Debt 0.5 1.0 0.8 0.2
Notes:
1. EBITDA includes gain on disposal of fixed assets and non-recuring income and expenses.
2. 2020 and 2021 capex exclude property-related addition to fixed assets.
RECENT PERFORMANCE
Q1 2024 % Δ vs PY YTD 2024 % Δ vs PY
Revenue 17.8 +12.0% 17.8 +12.0%
EBITDA 7.0 +18.6% 7.0 +18.6%
EBITDA Margin (%) 39.3% 39.3%
YTD Highlights:
● For Q1 2024, Zenith Innovations achieved revenue of $17.8 million and EBITDA of $7.0 million,
compared to revenue of $15.9 million and EBITDA of $5.9 million in Q1 2023.

═══ PAGE 3 ═══
Zenith Innovations Ltd.
YTD Highlights:
● The increase was primarily driven by the successful onboarding of three new large enterprise clients in the
healthcare sector and an expansion of services with existing financial clients.
● EBITDA margin improved due to efficient scaling of cloud infrastructure and disciplined cost management.
LONG TERM VIEW/OPERATING INITIATIVES
● Geographic Expansion: Actively exploring opportunities to expand market presence into new regions,
specifically targeting the APAC market in late 2024.
● Product Innovation: Investing heavily in R&D to integrate AI and machine learning capabilities into
existing platforms, enhancing predictive analytics for clients.
● Strategic Partnerships: Forging alliances with complementary technology providers to offer integrated
solutions and expand distribution channels.
● Talent Acquisition: Strengthening the engineering and sales teams to support rapid growth and maintain
competitive edge in product development and market penetration.
● Operational Efficiency: Implementing advanced analytics for internal operations to optimize resource
allocation and further improve profit margins.

═══ PAGE 4 ═══
EcoHarvest Solutions Inc.
Deal Team: Daniel Stone, Olivia Kim, Benjamin Wright
Date of Inv: April 2022 Primary Industry: Sustainable Agri Technology
Invested Capital: 60 Currency: US$ (in millions)
Capital Returned: 0 Location: California
Ownership: 70% Latest Audited FY: 31-Dec-2023
Inv Type: Equity-Control Latest Quarter: Q3 2024
Fund: Horizon Growth Fund I L.P. Co Website: http://www.eh-solutions.com
COMPANY INFORMATION
● Incorporated in 2018, EcoHarvest Solutions Inc. is an innovator in sustainable agricultural technology,
specializing in IoT-enabled smart farming systems and organic pest control solutions.
● The company's technology helps farms optimize resource usage, reduce waste, and improve crop yields.
EcoHarvest serves agricultural clients across North and South America.
INVESTMENT THESIS
● High-Growth Sector: Capitalizing on the increasing global demand for sustainable and efficient
agricultural practices.
● Proprietary Technology: EcoHarvest's patented IoT sensors and bio-pesticides offer a distinct competitive
advantage in precision agriculture.
● Strong Environmental Impact: Aligns with growing ESG mandates and consumer preference for
sustainably produced food.
HISTORICAL PERFORMANCE
(FYE Dec-31, in US$ million) 2020 2021 2022 2023 3 Yr CAGR
Revenue 15.0 20.0 28.0 40.0 33.3%
EBITDA 4.0 6.5 9.0 14.0 49.3%
EBITDA Margin (%) 26.7% 32.5% 32.1% 35.0%
Capex 0.8 1.1 1.5 2.0
Net Debt 0.2 0.3 0.4 0.1
Notes:
1. EBITDA includes gain on disposal of fixed assets.
2. R&D expenses in 2022 were capitalized.
RECENT PERFORMANCE
Q3 2024 % Δ vs PY YTD 2024 % Δ vs PY
Revenue 15.5 +25.0% 40.5 +30.6%
EBITDA 6.0 +33.3% 14.0 +40.0%
EBITDA Margin (%) 38.7% 34.6%
YTD Highlights:
● For Q3 2024, EcoHarvest Solutions achieved revenue of $15.5 million and EBITDA of $6.0 million,
demonstrating strong sequential growth. Year-to-date revenue reached $40.5 million and EBITDA $14.0
million, representing significant increases over the same period last year.

═══ PAGE 5 ═══
EcoHarvest Solutions Inc.
YTD Highlights:
● The growth was primarily fueled by the successful launch of a new compact smart irrigation system and
expanded partnerships with large-scale organic farms.
LONG TERM VIEW/OPERATING INITIATIVES
● Technology Advancement: Continuous investment in R&D to develop next-generation bio-sensors and
AI-driven predictive analytics for crop health.
● Market Diversification: Exploring entry into new agricultural segments, such as vertical farming and
hydroponics, to broaden market reach.
● Global Expansion: Targeting key agricultural markets in Europe and Asia through strategic alliances and
localized product adaptations.
● Supply Chain Optimization: Implementing advanced logistics and inventory management systems to
reduce costs and improve delivery efficiency.
● Talent Development: Investing in specialized training for technical and sales teams to maintain leadership
in a rapidly evolving industry.

═══ PAGE 2 ═══
Zenith Innovations Ltd.
Deal Team: Evelyn Reed, Marcus Chen, Sophia Lee
Date of Inv: December 2021 Primary Industry: Cloud Software Solutions
Invested Capital: 75 Currency: US$ (in millions)
Capital Returned: 0 Location: New York
Ownership: 65% Latest Audited FY: 31-Dec-2023
Inv Type: Equity-Control Latest Quarter: Q1 2024
Fund: Horizon Growth Fund I L.P. Co Website: http://www.zenith-innovations.com
COMPANY INFORMATION
● Incorporated in 2015, Zenith Innovations is a leading provider of scalable cloud-based software solutions
for enterprise resource planning (ERP) and customer relationship management (CRM).
● Zenith serves a growing client base across North America and Europe, with a strong emphasis on data
security and user-friendly interfaces.
INVESTMENT THESIS
● Robust Product Suite: Zenith’s comprehensive ERP and CRM platforms are highly customizable, offering
competitive advantages in specific vertical markets.
● Recurring Revenue Model: High proportion of subscription-based revenue, ensuring stable and
predictable cash flows.
● Strong Client Retention: Demonstrated ability to retain clients through superior customer service and
continuous product innovation.
HISTORICAL PERFORMANCE
(FYE Dec-31, in US$ million) 2020 2021 2022 2023 3 Yr CAGR
Revenue 28.0 35.5 48.0 62.5 29.5%
EBITDA 9.5 12.0 17.5 24.0 35.1%
EBITDA Margin (%) 33.9% 33.8% 36.5% 38.4%
Capex 1.2 1.8 2.5 3.0
Net Debt 0.5 1.0 0.8 0.2
Notes:
1. EBITDA includes gain on disposal of fixed assets and non-recuring income and expenses.
2. 2020 and 2021 capex exclude property-related addition to fixed assets.
RECENT PERFORMANCE
Q1 2024 % Δ vs PY YTD 2024 % Δ vs PY
Revenue 17.8 +12.0% 17.8 +12.0%
EBITDA 7.0 +18.6% 7.0 +18.6%
EBITDA Margin (%) 39.3% 39.3%
YTD Highlights:
● For Q1 2024, Zenith Innovations achieved revenue of $17.8 million and EBITDA of $7.0 million,
compared to revenue of $15.9 million and EBITDA of $5.9 million in Q1 2023.

═══ PAGE 3 ═══
Zenith Innovations Ltd.
YTD Highlights:
● The increase was primarily driven by the successful onboarding of three new large enterprise clients in the
healthcare sector and an expansion of services with existing financial clients.
● EBITDA margin improved due to efficient scaling of cloud infrastructure and disciplined cost management.
LONG TERM VIEW/OPERATING INITIATIVES
● Geographic Expansion: Actively exploring opportunities to expand market presence into new regions,
specifically targeting the APAC market in late 2024.
● Product Innovation: Investing heavily in R&D to integrate AI and machine learning capabilities into
existing platforms, enhancing predictive analytics for clients.
● Strategic Partnerships: Forging alliances with complementary technology providers to offer integrated
solutions and expand distribution channels.
● Talent Acquisition: Strengthening the engineering and sales teams to support rapid growth and maintain
competitive edge in product development and market penetration.
● Operational Efficiency: Implementing advanced analytics for internal operations to optimize resource
allocation and further improve profit margins.

═══ PAGE 4 ═══
EcoHarvest Solutions Inc.
Deal Team: Daniel Stone, Olivia Kim, Benjamin Wright
Date of Inv: April 2022 Primary Industry: Sustainable Agri Technology
Invested Capital: 60 Currency: US$ (in millions)
Capital Returned: 0 Location: California
Ownership: 70% Latest Audited FY: 31-Dec-2023
Inv Type: Equity-Control Latest Quarter: Q3 2024
Fund: Horizon Growth Fund I L.P. Co Website: http://www.eh-solutions.com
COMPANY INFORMATION
● Incorporated in 2018, EcoHarvest Solutions Inc. is an innovator in sustainable agricultural technology,
specializing in IoT-enabled smart farming systems and organic pest control solutions.
● The company's technology helps farms optimize resource usage, reduce waste, and improve crop yields.
EcoHarvest serves agricultural clients across North and South America.
INVESTMENT THESIS
● High-Growth Sector: Capitalizing on the increasing global demand for sustainable and efficient
agricultural practices.
● Proprietary Technology: EcoHarvest's patented IoT sensors and bio-pesticides offer a distinct competitive
advantage in precision agriculture.
● Strong Environmental Impact: Aligns with growing ESG mandates and consumer preference for
sustainably produced food.
HISTORICAL PERFORMANCE
(FYE Dec-31, in US$ million) 2020 2021 2022 2023 3 Yr CAGR
Revenue 15.0 20.0 28.0 40.0 33.3%
EBITDA 4.0 6.5 9.0 14.0 49.3%
EBITDA Margin (%) 26.7% 32.5% 32.1% 35.0%
Capex 0.8 1.1 1.5 2.0
Net Debt 0.2 0.3 0.4 0.1
Notes:
1. EBITDA includes gain on disposal of fixed assets.
2. R&D expenses in 2022 were capitalized.
RECENT PERFORMANCE
Q3 2024 % Δ vs PY YTD 2024 % Δ vs PY
Revenue 15.5 +25.0% 40.5 +30.6%
EBITDA 6.0 +33.3% 14.0 +40.0%
EBITDA Margin (%) 38.7% 34.6%
YTD Highlights:
● For Q3 2024, EcoHarvest Solutions achieved revenue of $15.5 million and EBITDA of $6.0 million,
demonstrating strong sequential growth. Year-to-date revenue reached $40.5 million and EBITDA $14.0
million, representing significant increases over the same period last year.

═══ PAGE 5 ═══
EcoHarvest Solutions Inc.
YTD Highlights:
● The growth was primarily fueled by the successful launch of a new compact smart irrigation system and
expanded partnerships with large-scale organic farms.
LONG TERM VIEW/OPERATING INITIATIVES
● Technology Advancement: Continuous investment in R&D to develop next-generation bio-sensors and
AI-driven predictive analytics for crop health.
● Market Diversification: Exploring entry into new agricultural segments, such as vertical farming and
hydroponics, to broaden market reach.
● Global Expansion: Targeting key agricultural markets in Europe and Asia through strategic alliances and
localized product adaptations.
● Supply Chain Optimization: Implementing advanced logistics and inventory management systems to
reduce costs and improve delivery efficiency.
● Talent Development: Investing in specialized training for technical and sales teams to maintain leadership
in a rapidly evolving industry.

recent_events.value: Q1 2024: 1) Onboarded 3 new large healthcare clients. 2) Expanded services with existing financial clients. 3) EBITDA margin improvement to 39.3% via cloud scaling and cost management. 4) Revenue +12% YoY to $17.8M, EBITDA +18.6% YoY to $7.0M.

company_assessment.value: Strong performer with 29.5% 3-year revenue CAGR and 35.1% EBITDA CAGR. Focus on AI/ML integration, geographic expansion (APAC by late 2024), and operational efficiency. High client retention and recurring revenue model are key strengths.

exit_expectations.value: Not explicitly stated (likely strategic sale to AgriTech consolidator or IPO)

recent_events.value: Q3 2024: 1) Launched compact smart irrigation system. 2) Expanded partnerships with large-scale organic farms. 3) Revenue +25% YoY to $15.5M in Q3, YTD revenue +30.6% to $40.5M. 4) EBITDA +33.3% YoY to $6.0M in Q3, YTD EBITDA +40% to $14.0M.

company_assessment.value: High-growth company with 33.3% 3-year revenue CAGR and 49.3% EBITDA CAGR. Focus on R&D for next-gen bio-sensors/AI, market diversification (vertical farming, hydroponics), and global expansion (Europe/Asia). Strong ESG alignment and proprietary tech are competitive advantages.

COMPANY INFORMATION
● Incorporated in 2015, Zenith Innovations is a leading provider of scalable cloud-based software solutions
for enterprise resource planning (ERP) and customer relationship management (CRM).
● Zenith serves a growing client base across North America and Europe, with a strong emphasis on data
security and user-friendly interfaces.
INVESTMENT THESIS
● Robust Product Suite: Zenith’s comprehensive ERP and CRM platforms are highly customizable, offering
competitive advantages in specific vertical markets.
● Recurring Revenue Model: High proportion of subscription-based revenue, ensuring stable and
predictable cash flows.
● Strong Client Retention: Demonstrated ability to retain clients through superior customer service and
continuous product innovation.
HISTORICAL PERFORMANCE
(FYE Dec-31, in US$ million) 2020 2021 2022 2023 3 Yr CAGR

EBITDA 7.0 +18.6% 7.0 +18.6%

YTD Highlights:
● For Q1 2024, Zenith Innovations achieved revenue of $17.8 million and EBITDA of $7.0 million,
compared to revenue of $15.9 million and EBITDA of $5.9 million in Q1 2023.

═══ PAGE 3 ═══
Zenith Innovations Ltd.
YTD Highlights:
● The increase was primarily driven by the successful onboarding of three new large enterprise clients in the
healthcare sector and an expansion of services with existing financial clients.
● EBITDA margin improved due to efficient scaling of cloud infrastructure and disciplined cost management.
LONG TERM VIEW/OPERATING INITIATIVES
● Geographic Expansion: Actively exploring opportunities to expand market presence into new regions,
specifically targeting the APAC market in late 2024.
● Product Innovation: Investing heavily in R&D to integrate AI and machine learning capabilities into
existing platforms, enhancing predictive analytics for clients.
● Strategic Partnerships: Forging alliances with complementary technology providers to offer integrated
solutions and expand distribution channels.
● Talent Acquisition: Strengthening the engineering and sales teams to support rapid growth and maintain
competitive edge in product development and market penetration.
● Operational Efficiency: Implementing advanced analytics for internal operations to optimize resource
allocation and further improve profit margins.

COMPANY INFORMATION
● Incorporated in 2018, EcoHarvest Solutions Inc. is an innovator in sustainable agricultural technology,
specializing in IoT-enabled smart farming systems and organic pest control solutions.
● The company's technology helps farms optimize resource usage, reduce waste, and improve crop yields.
EcoHarvest serves agricultural clients across North and South America.
INVESTMENT THESIS
● High-Growth Sector: Capitalizing on the increasing global demand for sustainable and efficient
agricultural practices.
● Proprietary Technology: EcoHarvest's patented IoT sensors and bio-pesticides offer a distinct competitive
advantage in precision agriculture.
● Strong Environmental Impact: Aligns with growing ESG mandates and consumer preference for
sustainably produced food.
HISTORICAL PERFORMANCE

Revenue 15.5 +25.0% 40.5 +30.6%

YTD Highlights:
● For Q3 2024, EcoHarvest Solutions achieved revenue of $15.5 million and EBITDA of $6.0 million,
demonstrating strong sequential growth. Year-to-date revenue reached $40.5 million and EBITDA $14.0
million, representing significant increases over the same period last year.

═══ PAGE 5 ═══
EcoHarvest Solutions Inc.
YTD Highlights:
● The growth was primarily fueled by the successful launch of a new compact smart irrigation system and
expanded partnerships with large-scale organic farms.
LONG TERM VIEW/OPERATING INITIATIVES
● Technology Advancement: Continuous investment in R&D to develop next-generation bio-sensors and
AI-driven predictive analytics for crop health.
● Market Diversification: Exploring entry into new agricultural segments, such as vertical farming and
hydroponics, to broaden market reach.
● Global Expansion: Targeting key agricultural markets in Europe and Asia through strategic alliances and
localized product adaptations.
● Supply Chain Optimization: Implementing advanced logistics and inventory management systems to
reduce costs and improve delivery efficiency.
● Talent Development: Investing in specialized training for technical and sales teams to maintain leadership
in a rapidly evolving industry.
